Sentence: I like this park. It is big and beautiful.
Sentence_TW: 我喜歡這個公園。它是大又美麗的。

Sentence: Terry plays sports in his free time.
Sentence_TW: 特里在業餘時間參加運動。

Sentence: Hurry up! We don't have much time.
Sentence_TW: 趕快！我們沒有太多時間。

Sentence: Frank is on the school baseball team.
Sentence_TW: 弗蘭克在學校棒球隊中。

Sentence: Jack practices basketball after school every day.
Sentence_TW: 傑克每天放學後練習籃球。

Sentence: I wash my book bag every six months.
Sentence_TW: 我每六個月洗一次書包。

Sentence: A: I don't watch TV. B: Really? Then what do you do in your free time?
Sentence_TW: 答：我不看電視。B：真的嗎？那你在空閒時間做什麼？

Sentence: That bear is swimming.
Sentence_TW: 那隻熊在游泳。

Sentence: Can I please join your basketball team?
Sentence_TW: 我可以加入您的籃球隊嗎？

Sentence: Camila has beautiful brown eyes.
Sentence_TW: 卡米拉有美麗的棕色眼睛。

Sentence: I like your hair color.
Sentence_TW: 我喜歡你的頭髮顏色。

Sentence: I know Viola Huang? She is my cousin.
Sentence_TW: 我認識黃色黃嗎？她是我表妹。

Sentence: There are nine hundred students in my school.
Sentence_TW: 我學校有900名學生。

Sentence: The ruler is fifteen centimeters long.
Sentence_TW: 統治者長15厘米。

Sentence: A: That band is really popular in the USA. B: You can say that again!
Sentence_TW: 答：該樂隊在美國真的很受歡迎。B：您可以再說一遍！

Sentence: My sister practices the guitar in her room.
Sentence_TW: 我姐姐在她的房間裡練習吉他。

Sentence: Many students in the class can play the piano.
Sentence_TW: 班上的許多學生可以彈鋼琴。

Sentence: The boy is flying a kite.
Sentence_TW: 這個男孩正在放風箏。

Sentence: I can paint the walls.
Sentence_TW: 我可以畫牆壁。

Sentence: We can make a cake for Sue's birthday.
Sentence_TW: 我們可以為甦的生日做蛋糕。

Sentence: Pinocchio's nose is long and thin.
Sentence_TW: 皮諾奇奧的鼻子長而稀薄。

Sentence: My legs are 90 centimeters long.
Sentence_TW: 我的腿長90厘米。

Sentence: This house is large for my family.
Sentence_TW: 這房子對我的家人來說很大。

Sentence: The dog's ears are very big.
Sentence_TW: 狗的耳朵很大。

Sentence: Don't talk with your mouth full.
Sentence_TW: 不要用嘴巴說話。

Sentence: Harry has many thick books.
Sentence_TW: 哈利有很多厚書。

Sentence: Dogs' lips are black.
Sentence_TW: 狗的嘴唇是黑色的。

Sentence: These bugs are small but strong.
Sentence_TW: 這些蟲子很小，但很強。

Sentence: Those monkeys have really long arms.
Sentence_TW: 那些猴子的手臂真的很長。

Sentence: The doghouse is 50 centimeters in height.
Sentence_TW: 狗屋高50厘米。

Sentence: That handsome man over there is Zoe's favorite baseball player.
Sentence_TW: 那邊那個英俊的男人是佐伊最喜歡的棒球運動員。

Sentence: The girl band comes from the USA.
Sentence_TW: 女樂隊來自美國。

Sentence: He has a strong body.
Sentence_TW: 他的身體很強。

Sentence: There are not enough markers for the students.
Sentence_TW: 學生沒有足夠的標記。

Sentence: Jeremy puts his all into every game.
Sentence_TW: 傑里米（Jeremy）將自己的全部投入到每場比賽中。

Sentence: Please put your pencils into the pencil case.
Sentence_TW: 請把鉛筆放入鉛筆盒中。

Sentence: Grandma cooks a lot of food for us on Thanksgiving every year.
Sentence_TW: 奶奶每年在感恩節上為我們廚師做很多食物。

Sentence: Vincent is very different from his brother.
Sentence_TW: 文森特與他的兄弟大不相同。

Sentence: My brothers both go to top schools.
Sentence_TW: 我的兄弟們都去頂級學校。

Sentence: Adam is very good at basketball. On the other hand, he's new to baseball.
Sentence_TW: 亞當擅長籃球。另一方面，他是棒球的新手。

Sentence: For a baseball player, he's not very strong, but he makes up for it with a lot of practice.
Sentence_TW: 對於棒球運動員來說，他不是很強壯，但是他通過很多練習來彌補這一點。

Sentence: The black picture on the orange wall really stands out.
Sentence_TW: 橙色牆上的黑色圖片確實很突出。
